BellmanFordShortestPath<T> - Class in cu.edu.cujae.graphy.algorithms
El algoritmo Bellman-Ford genera el camino mínimo desde un vértice al resto de vértices en un digrafo (con posibles pesos negativos en algunas de las aristas).

build(Node<?>, Node<?>) - Method in class cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.defaults.DefaultEdgeFactory
A method similar to EdgeFactory.build(java.lang.Object, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Node<?>, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Node<?>, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Weight<?>) not taking the label parameter nor the weight.
build(Node<?>, Node<?>) - Method in interface cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.EdgeFactory
A method similar to EdgeFactory.build(java.lang.Object, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Node<?>, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Node<?>, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Weight<?>) not taking the label parameter nor the weight.
build(Object, Node<?>, Node<?>) - Method in class cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.defaults.DefaultEdgeFactory
A method similar to EdgeFactory.build(java.lang.Object, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Node<?>, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Node<?>, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Weight<?>) but that does not accept a weight.It is provided as a convenience method for unweighted graphs, avoiding the explicit pass of the null parameter for the weight.
build(Object, Node<?>, Node<?>) - Method in interface cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.EdgeFactory
A method similar to EdgeFactory.build(java.lang.Object, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Node<?>, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Node<?>, cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.Weight<?>) but that does not accept a weight.It is provided as a convenience method for unweighted graphs, avoiding the explicit pass of the null parameter for the weight.
build(Object, Node<?>, Node<?>, Weight<?>) - Method in class cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.defaults.DefaultDirectedEdgeFactory
This method should build a new Edge instance given start and final nodes.If the node can't be constructed by some particular reason this method should return null.Neither the initial nor the final nodes may be null, but the weight can, in which case the result is an unweighted edge.
build(Object, Node<?>, Node<?>, Weight<?>) - Method in class cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.defaults.DefaultNotDirectedEdgeFactory
This method should build a new Edge instance given start and final nodes.If the node can't be constructed by some particular reason this method should return null.Neither the initial nor the final nodes may be null, but the weight can, in which case the result is an unweighted edge.
build(Object, Node<?>, Node<?>, Weight<?>) - Method in interface cu.edu.cujae.graphy.core.EdgeFactory
This method should build a new Edge instance given start and final nodes.If the node can't be constructed by some particular reason this method should return null.Neither the initial nor the final nodes may be null, but the weight can, in which case the result is an unweighted edge.
